nodes.text: Sullivapat was a data slicer from the planet Denevar who was considered legendary around the time of the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. They believed that success in life was dependent on both knowing the right people and knowing all of their secrets.
Sullivapat was mentioned in the 2008 reference book Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, which is a companion guide to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
